com.opensource.bitmaploader

类 ImageFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensource.bitmaploader.ImageWorker
      • com.opensource.bitmaploader.ImageResizer
        • com.opensource.bitmaploader.ImageFetcher

  • public class ImageFetcher
extends ImageResizer
    A simple subclass of ImageResizer that fetches and resizes images fetched from a URL.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 com.opensource.bitmaploader.ImageWorker

        ImageWorker.ImageWorkerAdapter, ImageWorker.LoadListener

    • 方法详细资料

      • downloadBitmap

        public static java.io.File downloadBitmap(android.content.Context context,
                                          java.lang.String urlString,
                                          ImageWorker.LoadListener l)
        Download a bitmap from a URL, write it to a disk and return the File pointer. This implementation uses a simple disk cache.
        参数:
        context - The context to use
        urlString - The URL to fetch
        返回:
        A File pointing to the fetched bitmap

      • processBitmap

        protected android.graphics.Bitmap processBitmap(java.lang.Object data,
                                                android.graphics.Bitmap.Config config,
                                                ImageWorker.LoadListener l)
        从类复制的说明: ImageWorker
        Subclasses should override this to define any processing or work that must happen to produce the final bitmap. This will be executed in a background thread and be long running. For example, you could resize a large bitmap here, or pull down an image from the network.
        覆盖:
        processBitmap 在类中 ImageResizer
        参数:
        data - The data to identify which image to process, as provided by ImageWorker.loadImage(Object, android.widget.ImageView)
        config - The config of bitmap.
        返回:
        The processed bitmap
